ygData.subject: New MMORPG?
ygData.msgSnippet: Have any of you ever read Bruce Sterling or William Gibson? Enjoyed Blade Runner or The Matrix? Well, if they can pull it off, a relatively unheard-of software
ygData.messageBody:
Have any of you ever read Bruce Sterling or William Gibson?
Enjoyed Blade Runner or The Matrix?

Well, if they can pull it off, a relatively unheard-of software house
called Funcom is producing a game that I would definitely like to
try, called Anarchy Online.

There are links at stratics.com for any who are interested.
Definitely a different path from the medieval overdose we've been
getting for MMORGs.

Then again, maybe this restlessness I am feeling will happen with
almost any online RPG I play... it happened in UO, it's starting to
happen in EQ. *shrug*


--


Love is in the air...
Get me a gas mask, quick!!!

Cya,
Praetor

Praetor@...
ICQ 1767778
